languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс издает невеселый смех.{/n} "Да, и я сразу же начну тебя отчитывать, как в старые добрые времена, и мы забудем о том, что было сказано до... боюсь, уже поздно прятаться за шутками".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс издает невеселый смех.{/n} "Да, и я сразу же начну тебя отчитывать, как в старые добрые времена, и мы забудем о том, что было сказано до... боюсь, уже поздно прятаться за шутками".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс издает невеселый смех.{/n} "Да, и я сразу же начну тебя отчитывать, как в старые добрые времена, и мы забудем о том, что было сказано до... боюсь, уже поздно прятаться за шутками".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."
{n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."
{n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."
{n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."

languages.text: {n}海因里希发出了冰冷的笑声。{/n}“是啊，到时候我就会立刻训斥你，就像过去那样。我们就当之前那些事情都没有发生过……这种时候还开玩笑，恐怕已经太迟了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希发出了冰冷的笑声。{/n}“是啊，到时候我就会立刻训斥你，就像过去那样。我们就当之前那些事情都没有发生过……这种时候还开玩笑，恐怕已经太迟了。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se ríe con frialdad.{/n} «Claro, y yo empezaré a regañarla como en los viejos tiempos y nos olvidaremos de todo lo dicho.... me temo que es tarde para escondernos con bromas».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se ríe con frialdad.{/n} «Claro, y yo empezaré a regañarla como en los viejos tiempos y nos olvidaremos de todo lo dicho.... me temo que es tarde para escondernos con bromas».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは冷たく笑う。{/n}「そうだな、すぐに昔のように叱責を始めて、言われたことは忘れよう…冗談でごまかすには、もう手遅れのようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは冷たく笑う。{/n}「そうだな、すぐに昔のように叱責を始めて、言われたことは忘れよう…冗談でごまかすには、もう手遅れのようだ」

languages.text: {n}Le rire d'Heinrix n'a rien de chaleureux.{/n} « Pour que je vous réprimande comme avant et que nous oubliions ensuite toute cette conversation ? Je crains qu'il ne soit trop tard pour nous cacher derrière l'humour. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire d'Heinrix n'a rien de chaleureux.{/n} « Pour que je vous réprimande comme avant et que nous oubliions ensuite toute cette conversation ? Je crains qu'il ne soit trop tard pour nous cacher derrière l'humour. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lacht kaltblütig.{/n} "Genau, und dann weise ich Euch wieder zurecht, so wie in den guten alten Zeiten, und wir vergessen einfach, was wir gesagt haben ... Ich fürchte, es ist zu spät, sich hinter Witzen zu verstecken."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lacht kaltblütig.{/n} "Genau, und dann weise ich Euch wieder zurecht, so wie in den guten alten Zeiten, und wir vergessen einfach, was wir gesagt haben ... Ich fürchte, es ist zu spät, sich hinter Witzen zu verstecken."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, soğuk bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Tabii ki. Ben de eskisi gibi hemen seni azarlamaya başlayayım ki ne söylendiğini bile unutalım... Ne yazık ki esprilerin ardına saklandığımız vakitler geride kaldı."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs coldly.{/n} "Right, and I'll immediately start reprimanding you like in the good old days, and we'll forget what was said... I'm afraid it's too late to hide behind jokes."
